description:
A sunny, tidy, and cleverly organized, 300 sf mini studio in Lower East Side / China Town. Incredible neighborhood with many great restaurants, galleries and shops. Steps away from museums, Williamsburg bridge, & Soho. Bike station, Subway and bike paths are just a block away. 

My place is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business (URL HIDDEN) place is good for couples, and business travelers.

You will have private access to the entire 300 sq feet! :)

Please feel free to text or message me if you have any questions or need any recommendations.

The apartment is a couple quick blocks from all the main metro lines to help you get around Manhattan or even Brooklyn within minutes.

Please note the apt has a 3rd floor walk up with no elevator.
name: LES Minimalistic Studio
review: I had a great stay at Kris & Tiffani's place in the Lower East Side. The apartment is very convenient to multiple Subway stops and is easy to get around from. It IS an efficiency apartment and a walk-up, but that's the charm of Manhattan and living the NY life for a week. I should mention that the bed is very firm - I'm a fan, but I know not everyone is. Everything was very clean and organized and Kris was great at communicating at appropriate times, we were never bothered. I highly recommend their place!
